description: A great combination of smoky salty meat and zesty orange in this stuffing recipe.
name: Pancetta, Orange & Sage Stuffing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and finely diced
1 medium red onion, peeled and finely diced
3 cloves garlic, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Melt the butter a pan with the chopped pancetta chopped onions and garlic and fry for 5 minutes until the butter has melted fully.
Mix together the breadcrumbs and herbs in a separate bowl with the seasoning and orange zest and then combine the melted butter mix incrementally.
Ensure the total mixture is combined fully and transfer to a baking dish to be baked for 20 minutes and then remove form the heat.
